replies.message: lol i have been a fan for a long time and he uses that word a lot

From Infinite till now.

he can't use the word "nigga" obviously, he's white

indeed, infinite was a disaster back then :D
I live in Detroit. I hung out with proof and swifty. Pretty sure I know the story of em better than most ppl on here Js
so he's a saint cause he never used the n word. gtfo

infinite  was a beast actually. his most lyrical stuff to date. but at the time ppl thought he was trying to sound like nas. not great production quality though but this was 1995-96. He only pressed 1000 copies
I used to frequent the hip hop shop in detroit back then when d12 would have battles every weekend, place is long closed now
Tell that to Kid Rock, Tomi.
Ya cuz he'd be getting jumped everyday by black's if he did. Obviously he's smart enough not to use it
He used the word on the track Remember me on the mmlp

People thought he was trying to sound like AZ NOT NAS he says it right in his documentary. And ifinite did start his career or it wouldnt be on his discography on wikipedia. It just wasnt a main stream album. Only sold 1,000 copies but was a very lyrical album but not his most lyrical.
Infinite is what made dre go after eminem and sign him.
And if im correct bro you live about 60 miles south west of detriot lol

He never said the n word. He made a song when he was like 15 when this black chick broke up with him so he got all butt hurt about it and made a song dissing her. Then he cleared it up on yellow brick road listen to the song. In eminems professional career hes nevee use the n word once. You are not a eminem fan if you say otherwise
infinite  is not why dre signed em. dre heard em at the rap olympics in cali first.
if a white uses the N word, he will be called a racist. and eminem doesnt want to be called a racist.
i did not update where i live. im in warren, so re investigate.
I am not a eminem fan btw.. I only grew up in the same area and mutual friends. I just thought some of these comments from ppl that think they know this guy were false and wanted to clear it up.
Umm mathew I'm a eminem fan and I have heard him say the n word once in a song, on the "I need a doctor" look up the lyrics, "nigger say its wack"
